alert.note: Alert for Guam (Guam) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued August 31 at 4:48PM ChST until August 31 at 8:30PM ChST by NWS Guam
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM CHST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Urban and small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...All of the island of Guam. * WHEN...Until 800 PM ChST. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. Water over roadways. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 444 PM ChST, Gauge reports indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. This will cause urban and small stream flooding. Overflowing poor drainage areas will cause minor flooding in All of Guam. Between 0.5 and 1 inch of rain has fallen. - All of Guam is the most likely place to experience minor flooding. Additional rainfall amounts of 1 to 3 inches are expected over the area. This additional rain will result in minor flooding. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads.
